creator: 株式会社MTG
descriptionHtml:
SIXPAD Official App helps you achieve comfortable training sessions by linking to SIXPAD training gear models equipped with Bluetooth.

Supports Blutooth models released after 4/29/2017

・Recommended environment
Android 5.0 and above

*When used with SIXPAD with the latest version of firmware.
You can update the firmware of your SIXPAD in the app.


・Tested devices
Galaxy S5,Galaxy S6,Galaxy S6 edge,Galaxy S7,Galaxy S7 edge,Galaxy Note5,Galaxy C7,GalaxyC7 pro,Galaxy A9,Galaxy C9 Pro,Galaxy S8, Galaxy Feel, Galaxy S9, Galaxy S9+, Xperia Z3,Xperia Z5 Compact,Xperia XZ,Xperia XZ1, Xperia XZ Premium, Xperia X Compact, Xperia XZs, Xperia XZ2,NEXUS 5,NEXUS 7,LG V10,LG style, vivo X7,vivo X9,AQUOS sense, AQUOS R,AQUOS R2,BASIO2, Android One,, arrows M03, arrows Be, DIGNO F, Qua phone QX, MONO, ZenFone 5, VAIO Phone A ,OPPO R15, Huawei P9, Xiaomi Redmi Note 4, Xiaomi Mi 5

• Remote control of SIXPAD devices
Use SIXPAD Official App to remotely operate the devices including configuring level settings and starting or pausing training sessions.
It can also synchronise multiple devices and train various areas of your body simultaneously.

• Training visualisation
To increase the effect of training, it is important to be aware of the areas you are exercising. SIXPAD Official App allows you to visualise the muscles you are exercising with your SIXPAD devices. It shows you the time you have exercised as well as how much time remains, so you always know how your session is going.

・Earn points and badges by training
Your training efforts and efficacy are visualised using our unique MPs, or muscle points.
On completion of a training session, you can collect an amount of MPs (muscle points) that varies according to the content of that session.
When meeting conditions, you will also get badges which you can collect as the result of your efforts.

Records daily training data
Training results will be automatically saved to the dashboard where you can review the parts you trained, along with MPs (muscle points) and badges you earned.

• Training advice from specialists in a variety of fields
Expert advice on beauty, health and training will be provided by experts in a variety of fields such as sports medicine, personal training and nutritional physiology.

Football player Cristiano Ronaldo
Emeritus Professor Toshio Moritani, Kyoto University
Tomoaki Makino, Football Player
Yuichiro Miura, Adventurer
Juri Edwards, Yoga Instructor
Mayu Sato, Bowel Care Practitioner
and others
